input_text:
Job Title: CNC Machinist

Location: Springfield, MA

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Management, Manufacturing

Description:
Reference

EPR007893

Posting Reference

IND3 #ZR

Location

Springfield, MA, USA

Type

Full Time

Job Category

Operations

Apply for this Job

EthosEnergy are currently recruiting for a Machinist A to join the team in Chicopee, Ma. This position will perform machine shop duties as directed by the Machine shop Foreman. Duties include machining activities utilizing cnc Milling machines, engine lathes, vertical lathes, boring machines and miscellaneous other machine shop support tooling and equipment

Job Responsibilities

Safely operate CNC Milling machines, engine lathes, CNC and manual vertical lathes, CNC boring machines and miscellaneous other machine shop support tooling and equipment

Responsible for the safe and timely completion of all assigned tasks while adhering to all applicable quality standards.

Adhering to all applicable Safety procedures and processes

Required Skills / Knowledge

Ability to accurately measure parts and components utilizing precision measuring equipment such as ID and OD micrometers, digital and dial calipers, dial indicators etc.

Accurately manufacture precision parts from a print

Accurately manufacture a precision part as per sample part

Ability to safely operate a fork lift and overhead cranes

Experience

Minimum of 6 years of Machine shop, CNC Machining experience

Education Requirements

High school diploma or equivalent

Physical Requirements

Ability to lift 50 LBS

Ability to stand for extended amounts of time

Must be a United States citizen or resident with a green card #ZR

What We Offer

Supportive company culture that values its employees

Comprehensive Medical, Dental, Vision & 401 K Plan

Paid Time Off & Holidays

Extra money in your paycheck - Employee Referral Bonus

Personal Development & Career Succession Planning

Company sponsored Perks & Discount programs

EthosEnergy is an Equal Opportunity Employer. Employment decisions are made without regard to race, color, religion, disability, genetic information, pregnancy, citizenship, marital status, sex/gender, sexual preference/ orientation, gender identity, age, veteran status, national origin, or any other status protected by law or regulation.

Experience Level (if available): Entry level
